segments.text: Eric , how long will you be in China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . Well , my contract here is for one year , and I don't know what I should do after that . Maybe going around for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , have you ever thought about learning some Chinese ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I am learning that now . But it's too hard for me . You know the four tones and the stuff . It really freaks me out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . All things are difficult before they are easy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You hit the nail right on the head .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , are you invested in some language-exchange program ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's where I teach you Chinese , and in exchange you teach me English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Awesome . I've been giving this a lot of thought . When can we do this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I'll give you a call tonight .
segments.speaker: S1
